trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the GridColumnStylesCollection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>，存取透過 GridColumnStylesCollection<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: The GridColumnStylesCollection uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: GridColumnStylesCollection 使用標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>管理集合的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷特定屬性值是否存在集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法，以判斷任何索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件在集合中的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the GridColumnStylesCollection before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 一定要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將它們加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>物件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>之前 GridColumnStylesCollection</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>的有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值加入集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自動為您產生的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the GridColumnStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件具有重複<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>GridColumnStylesCollection 的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Adds a column style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將資料行樣式加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入集合中的資料行樣式物件的陣列。

trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>来加入至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.target: 複製在陣列中以零為起始的索引開始。
